author: A_Brickset_user
title: Dumb Purchased rip-Off The old block
review: As for all the keychains, don't get them. here a waste of time and you can't play with them. It may be made nicer and stronger but what for. I'd rate the keychains below 1 in the categories. Harry potter looks just the same in the actual sets so why the heck bother with the collections unless your obsessed with harry potter in saome odd way.

author: hustla187
title: Not Worth It
review: Harry Potter appears in almost all the Harry Potter sets. I don't know why Lego released this even though it is the same thing as the minifigure and it's not really worth it. Don't bother with this set anyway.
